author: Ryan Smith
comment: Great app, at start it asks u to install watch app but u don't need to, just back out. Works on nexus 5 running marshmallow v6.0.1 but menus like encoding error control level and character encoding type are black font on black background so cannot view. Not Worth cash until Devs fix this.

reply.author: Chris Hopkin
reply.content: Hi Ryan, thank you for bringing this to my attention. I have released an update to fix this issue. If you have further issues, please contact me on the developer email address which can be found at the bottom of the store listing page.

title: Works even without watch!
